lore:
Shortly after their organization was founded, the Auditors observed a phenomenon that seemed to occur all over the world, and that often manifested in the royal families of Rodia's kingdoms.

Due to the dangerous ability of Alementals to get people drunk, Ilberd advised the ruler of Nex to forbid the owners of these creatures from setting them free.

Although its body is made of beer, the Venus Ryetrap is terrified of fire, as it is aware of the damage it can cause to the forests. It remains motionless at night, and some believe it is stalking prey, but it simply has its eyes fixed on a torch.
menagerieDialog: (To no one's surprise, this creature reeks of alcohol.)
(At the sight of you, it unleashes a series of violent hiccups. Gross though it may seem, they actually smell pretty good.)
(Alemental trafficking is perhaps one of Rodia's darkest problems.)
(Now here's a creature who knows how to party!)
(It's urinating into empty mugs and passing them out to your other creatures. Everyone will be drunk in no time at all!)
name: Ryetrap
